TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit PageParserFilter extends System.Object

summary.span: 为 ASP.NET 分析器所使用的页分析器筛选器提供一个抽象基类，以确定分析时是否允许在页中包含某项。

span.span: Provides an abstract base class for a page parser filter that is used by the ASP.NET parser to determine whether an item is allowed in the page at parse time.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何创建派生自的类类来控制 ASP.NET 页分析器的行为。The following example demonstrates how you can create a class that derives from the class to govern the behavior of the ASP.NET page parser. `CustomPageParserFilter`是一个分析器筛选显式拒绝页中的代码。The `CustomPageParserFilter` is a parser filter that explicitly rejects code in the page. 这是通过重写属性。It does this by overriding the property. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.PageParserFilter#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.PageParserFilter/CS/CustomPageParserFilter.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.PageParserFilter#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.PageParserFilter/VB/CustomPageParserFilter.vb#2)] 若要使用`CustomPageParserFilter`示例，将该类放在 App_Code 目录中。To use the `CustomPageParserFilter` sample, place the class in your App_Code directory. 你必须配置 ASP.NET 分析程序，以使用中的筛选器`pages`站点的 Web.config 配置文件节。You must configure the ASP.NET parsers to use the filter in the `pages` section of your site's Web.config configuration file. 下面的示例配置文件演示的配置`CustomPageParserFilter`。The following example configuration file shows the configuration for `CustomPageParserFilter`. 配置为使用分析器筛选器时，ASP.NET 分析器将引发异常生成期间，如果遇到在页中的代码。When configured to use a parser filter, the ASP.NET parser throws an exception during the build if it encounters code in a page. `` `` `` `` `` `` ``

remarks.format: ## Remarks 因为类不公开明确定义的公共构造函数，它由使用的页分析器初始化方法。Because the class does not expose well-defined public constructors, it is initialized by the page parsers that use the method. 重写方法将添加你自己的自定义初始化步骤的实例时是创建和 ASP.NET 所使用的。Override the method to add your own custom initialization steps when an instance of is created and used by ASP.NET. `virtualPath`参数传递给方法设置属性，而不能是`null`。The `virtualPath` parameter passed to the method sets the property, and cannot be `null`.

span.span: The default value is 0, which indicates that no controls are parsed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 页分析器将跟踪的控件，它分析，且如果数字超过设置的上限实例，则会引发异常。The ASP.NET page parser keeps track of the controls it parses, and if the number exceeds the limit set by a instance, it throws an exception.

value.span: 默认值为 0，表示不允许任何依赖项。

span.span: The default is 0, which indicates that no dependencies are allowed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类跟踪直接数以及间接的文件依赖项，它分析，，如果数值超出了限制设置实例，它将引发异常。The class keeps track of the number of direct and indirect file dependencies it parses, and if the number exceeds the limit set by a instance, it throws an exception.

MemberSignature.Value: protected string VirtualPath { get; }
.property instance string VirtualPath
Protected ReadOnly Property VirtualPath As String
protected: property System::String ^ VirtualPath { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取指向当前分析的页的虚拟路径。

span.span: Gets the virtual path to the page currently being parsed.

value.span: 指向 ASP.NET 页的虚拟路径。

span.span: A virtual path to an ASP.NET page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性不`null`。The property is never `null`.
